      • testRemoveAddTwo

        public void testRemoveAddTwo()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        1. removes and adds back two servers (incl leader). One of the servers is added back as observer 2. tests that reconfig fails if quorum of new config is not up 3. tests that a server that's not up during reconfig learns the new config when it comes up
        Throws:
